title: Set the Neovim
content:
Firstly Begin by installing neovim.
sudo pacman -S neovim Use the .lua to conigure NeoVim
can use the .vim to configure NeoVim too.
Set the config path of nvim In the linux system, the nvim config directory local in the ~/.config/nvim. This PATH also called runtime path , NeoVim read the ~/.config/nvim/init.lua by default.
In theory, all the config things can be placed in this .lua, but not a good idea.
So, separating the directory structure is essential.
. ├── init.lua ├── lazy-lock.json ├── lsp │ └── ty.lua └── lua ├── colorscheme.lua ├── keymaps.lua ├── lsp.lua ├── options.lua └── plugins.lua Explanation:
init.lua is the ==Entry point== of configuring nvim, it lead us to other .lua. coloscheme.lua configure the themes. keymaps.lua configure the Key mapping (按键映射). lsp.lua configure the [[LSP]] to realize automatic code completion (代码自动补全). options.lua configure the options plugins.lua configure the plugins. lazy-lock.json using the lazy.nvim will generate a Lock File. ==Don&rsquo;t …

Configure the firefox to hide TAB bar, address bar adn bookmark bar Enable CSS support Type &ldquo;about: config&rdquo; in the Firefox address bar and then press the Enter key Accept the risk and move on Search toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets Make sure its value is set to true. Find and create the CSS file Type &ldquo;about: support&rdquo; in the Firefox and press Enter. Find the line &ldquo;Profile Folder&rdquo; and open it Check if there is a folder named chrome. if not ,create it. Create a file userChrome.css including the following code. /* --- 默认隐藏 标签栏、地址栏、书签栏 --- */ #TabsToolbar, #nav-bar, #PersonalToolbar { /* 使用 max-height 来实现平滑的“滑出”效果，而不是突然消失 */ max-height: 0px !important; opacity: 0 !important; overflow: hidden !important; /* 动画效果 */而不是突然消失 */ max-height: 0px !important; opacity: 0 !important; overflow: hidden !important; /* 动画效果 */ transition: max-height 0.15s ease-out, opacity 0.15s ease-out !important; } /* --- 鼠标悬停在顶部时，显示所有工具栏 --- */ …
